rooms.description: Open-plan living space with minimalist design and floor-to-ceiling windows along the south-facing wall for natural light, aligning with Vastu principles.
Modular minimalist kitchen positioned to the east for prosperity and good health. Features a sleek design with open shelving.
Integrated home theater setup in a designated corner of the living area with acoustically treated walls and a projector screen. The seating is minimalist and comfortable.

openings.description: Large entryway with floor-to-ceiling glass door enhancing natural light and maintaining a minimalist aesthetic.
Balcony access for the living area leading to an east-facing balcony with ample space for relaxation.

rooms.description: Primary bedroom with an emphasis on minimalism. Features a spacious north-facing balcony as per Vastu guidelines for calm and peace.
Secondary bedroom designed with a minimalist approach. Includes a south-facing balcony for optimal sunlight and relaxation.
Functional bathroom with essential fixtures arranged in a minimalist style. Positioned to maintain balance and privacy.

openings.description: Staircase connecting the ground and upper floors with a minimalist design that ensures safety and accessibility.
Balcony access for each bedroom ensuring privacy and ample outdoor space, placed according to Vastu orientations.
